my_favourite_bni_story: Memory updated Here's a 300-word story for you: When indoor cricket began gaining traction in our region, it brought a fresh twist to the beloved game. However, the unique rules of indoor cricket posed challenges for players and organizers alike. My chapter member, Mr. Riza Ahmed, who owns an indoor cricket stadium, was at the forefront of this growing trend. He quickly realized that while the game was thrilling, managing the matches and keeping track of scores was a complex task. Riza was determined to streamline his operations and enhance the experience for his players. That's when I stepped in. With his vision and my expertise in mobile application development, we embarked on a journey to make indoor cricket more accessible and enjoyable. I developed a custom mobile application tailored to the specific needs of indoor cricket. The app not only simplified the management of the games but also ensured that the unique rules were seamlessly integrated into the system. From automatic score calculations to real-time updates and player statistics, the app covered every aspect of the game. The impact was immediate. Riza found that managing games became a breeze, and players were more engaged than ever. The app also introduced a booking system that allowed teams to reserve slots at the stadium, reducing downtime and maximising usage. Word spread quickly, and more players and teams began flocking to Riza's stadium, boosting his business.

With sensitive personal data at stake, the organization initiated a comprehensive Security Control Assessment (SCA) to evaluate its current security measures and pinpoint areas for improvement. A leading US healthcare provider, concerned about the rising number of ransomware attacks and the need to protect sensitive patient data, realized its internal cybersecurity team lacked the capacity for 24/7 monitoring. Despite having tools and dedicated staff, coverage gaps remained. By adopting a Managed Detection and Prevention service, the client reduced the cost of maintaining a full in-house team while ensuring continuous real-time monitoring and rapid threat response. Amid disruptions in the traditional healthcare business model, a leading US provider sought to identify security gaps in its critical applications that were impacting time-to-market and aimed to embed security into the development process. top_problem_solved: Many businesses struggle with an outdated, ineffective, or insecure website that fails to attract customers or support growth. At Levos, We solve this by delivering modern, responsive, and secure websites tailored to each client’s unique needs. My team and I ensure that every website: • Converts visitors into paying customers with compelling design and clear messaging, • Loads quickly and looks great on every device (mobile, tablet, desktop), • Is easy to update and maintain, even for non-technical users, • Ranks well in search engines as a result of SEO friendly websites, • Stays secure from cyber threats with up-to-date best practices. One of my proudest achievements was transforming a local business’s online presence: moving them from a confusing, slow, and outdated website to a user-friendly, high-converting digital storefront. Within three months of launch, their leads and online sales more than doubled—growing their business and reputation.

Since joining BNI, I have completed over 600 websites from BNI referrals for a diverse range of clients since 2019, helping countless businesses strengthen their online presence and grow. Every project has been an opportunity to turn connections into valued partnerships and real business growth. Being part of BNI has connected me with visionary entrepreneurs and professionals, inspiring me to consistently deliver my best work and contribute back to the network.

name: SHEREEF K M
top_product: Our top product at Planet Earth Holidays is our Luxury Resort Packages, designed for clients seeking the finest accommodations and unparalleled experiences. We specialize in curating bespoke stays at some of the world’s most exclusive luxury resorts. Whether it’s a private villa with a personal chef or a world-class resort nestled in a remote paradise, we ensure that every detail is tailored to perfection. Some of our standout offerings include:** Private Villas in Exotic Destinations – Featuring bespoke services, such as private butlers, chefs, and personalized excursions. Secluded Luxury Resorts in the Kerala Backwaters – Offering serene, waterfront experiences with exceptional service and curated wellness programs. Hilltop Luxury Retreats – In locations like Munnar and Wayanad, combining breathtaking views with world-class amenities for ultimate relaxation. Beachfront Luxury Resorts – In places like Varkala, offering stunning ocean views, personalized spa treatments, and private beach access. Our clients enjoy exclusive, stress-free escapes where every need is met with precision and care, ensuring a truly opulent and memorable experience.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is anyone looking to create unforgettable travel experiences. This includes: Families planning holidays or reunions. Honeymoon couples seeking romantic and personalized getaways. Corporate teams organizing retreats, conferences, or incentive trips. Event planners arranging destination weddings or special celebrations. Travel enthusiasts who want unique, tailored itineraries. I’d love introductions to HR managers, event organizers, or anyone passionate about exploring the world with ease and style.
top_problem_solved: At Planet Earth Holidays, we specialize in solving the most common travel-related challenges for our clients, ensuring their experiences are smooth and memorable. Some of the top problems we solve include: Personalized Itineraries for Unique Travel Needs: Many travelers struggle to find tailored, unique experiences. We create custom itineraries that cater to specific preferences, whether it’s a luxury beach getaway, an adventure holiday, or a family reunion, ensuring every trip is as individual as the traveler. Stress-Free Group and Corporate Travel: Organizing travel for large groups or corporate teams can be overwhelming. We handle all aspects—from group bookings and transportation to luxury accommodations and team-building activities—ensuring that all logistics run seamlessly. Handling Complex Travel Logistics: Coordinating international flights, visas, transfers, and accommodations can be a hassle. We manage all the intricate details for our clients, offering complete peace of mind and a hassle-free experience from start to finish. Exclusive Access to Luxury Resorts and Unique Locations: Many travelers seek exclusivity, but finding the best luxury resorts in unique locations can be challenging. We partner with top luxury resorts and private properties to offer our clients exclusive access to the world’s most sought-after destinations. Ensuring Safety and Comfort for VIP Clients: High-profile clients often face challenges in securing private, safe, and comfortable travel experiences. We provide bespoke services, from private villas and jets to security, ensuring every aspect of their trip is handled with the utmost care and discretion. Last-Minute Travel Arrangements: Whether it’s a sudden business trip or a last-minute family vacation, we excel at arranging seamless, urgent travel plans without compromising on quality or service. Curating Memorable Experiences for Special Occasions: Be it a milesto
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories comes from a referral I received through a fellow member. A client had been looking for a unique destination for their company’s annual retreat, and after a brief conversation with the BNI member, I was introduced to the company. Not only did I curate a tailor-made retreat that exceeded their expectations, but the success of that event led to an ongoing partnership, bringing in multiple referrals for future corporate travel. What made it special was not just the business success, but the trust and camaraderie I experienced through BNI. It showed me the power of building strong relationships within the chapter, where every referral feels like a step toward mutual success.
